Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus

Class DatacenterEX

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Datacenter
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.DatacenterEX
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HddDataCenter
public class DatacenterEX extends Datacenter
Extended datacenter, that allows for VM booting delays to be modeled.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

    • processOtherEvent

      protected void processOtherEvent(SimEvent ev)
      Description copied from class: Datacenter
      Process non-default received events that aren't processed by the Datacenter.processEvent(org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEvent) method. This method should be overridden by subclasses in other to process new defined events.
      Overrides:
      processOtherEvent in class Datacenter
      Parameters:
      ev - information about the event just happened

    • processVmCreate

      protected void processVmCreate(SimEvent ev, boolean ack)
      Description copied from class: Datacenter
      Process the event for an User/Broker who wants to create a VM in this Datacenter. This Datacenter will then send the status back to the User/Broker.
      Overrides:
      processVmCreate in class Datacenter
      Parameters:
      ev - information about the event just happened
      ack - indicates if the event's sender expects to receive an acknowledge message when the event finishes to be processed
